targets.expr: sum(nodes_cpu_usage{cluster=~"$cluster", kubernetes_node=~"$node", mode="utilized", unit="cores", type="system"}) / ignoring(unit, type, mode) sum(nodes_cpu_total{cluster=~"$cluster", kubernetes_node=~"$node"})

sum(nodes_memory_usage{cluster=~"$cluster", mode="utilized", unit="bytes", type="system", kubernetes_node=~"$node"}) / ignoring(mode, unit, type) sum(nodes_memory_total{cluster=~"$cluster", kubernetes_node=~"$node"})

sum(nodes_cpu_usage{cluster=~"$cluster", mode="utilized", unit="cores", type="containers", kubernetes_node=~"$node"}) / ignoring(unit, type, mode) sum(nodes_cpu_total{cluster=~"$cluster", kubernetes_node=~"$node"})

sum(nodes_memory_usage{cluster=~"$cluster", mode="utilized", unit="bytes", type="containers", kubernetes_node=~"$node"}) / ignoring(mode, unit, type) sum(nodes_memory_total{cluster=~"$cluster", kubernetes_node=~"$node"})
sum(nodes_disk_usage{cluster=~"$cluster", kubernetes_node=~"$node", mode="utilized", unit="byte"}) / sum(nodes_disk_total{cluster=~"$cluster", kubernetes_node=~"$node"})

sum(nodes_cpu_usage{cluster=~"$cluster", kubernetes_node=~"$node", unit="cores", mode="utilized", type="containers"}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests:running{cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node", resource="cpu", unit="core"})

sum(nodes_cpu_usage{cluster=~"$cluster", kubernetes_node=~"$node", unit="cores", mode="utilized", type="containers"}) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits:running{cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node", resource="cpu", unit="core"})

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node"}) by (container, pod, namespace) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests:running{cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node",resource="cpu",unit="core"}) by (container, pod, namespace)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node"}) by (container, pod, namespace) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits:running{cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node",resource="cpu",unit="core"}) by (container, pod, namespace)

sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{instance=~"$node", container!="POD", container!="", cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m])) by (container, pod) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{instance=~"$node", container!="POD", container!="", cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m])) by (container, pod)

sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{instance=~"$node", container!="POD", container!="", cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m])) by (container, pod) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{instance=~"$node", container!="POD", container!="", cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m])) by (container, pod)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node",container!=""}) by (container, pod, namespace) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests:running{cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node",resource="memory",unit="byte"}) by (container, pod, namespace)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node",container!=""}) by (container, pod, namespace) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits:running{cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$node",resource="memory",unit="byte"}) by (container, pod, namespace)
